T02D3054:107b-1: ha ya gr'i ba s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D3054:107b-3: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D3054:107b-5: bde bar gshegs pas dgongs shing rtogs pa'i phyir dngos
T02D3054:107b-6: po thams cad ni 'di ltar gdod ma nas ma
T02D3054:107b-7: skyes shing mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3054:107b-8: de nas ri rab lcog brgyad pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can /
T02D3054:107b-9: de'i dbus su dpag tshad stong gi tshad tsam gyi 'od kyi phung po der nye bar gnas la /
T02D3054:107b-10: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs
T02D3054:107b-11: pa sngon du 'gro bas lus dang ngag dang yid
T02D3054:107b-13: de nas nam mkha' khyab pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sprul la //
T02D3054:107b-14: de nyid du h'um yig 'bar ba'i rnam pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D3054:107b-16: na ma: sa manta k'a ya b'aktsitta badzr'a n'om /
T02D3054:107b-17: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa 'di phyogs bcu mtha' yas
T02D3054:107b-18: pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D3054:107b-19: dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa ye shes
T02D3054:107b-20: kyi rnam pa spyan drangs la bzhugs so //
T02D3054:107b-21: yang gnyis pa la h'um yig gis rta mgrin bskul zhing spyan drangs la bzhugs so //
T02D3054:107b-22: gsum pa la h'um yig gis bdag nyid rdo rje rta mgrin gyi rang bzhin can te /
T02D3054:107b-23: sku mdog dmar po 'jigs par mdzad pa ;
T02D3054:107b-28: mche ba gtsigs shing tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa /
T02D3054:107b-29: mgo po'i phreng ba dang ral pa'i cod pan can /
T02D3054:107b-30: 'od dpag med spyi bor bzhugs pa /
T02D3054:107b-32: rta zhal sngon po h'i h'i'i sgra sgrogs pa /
T02D3054:107b-33: srid rtse'i mthar thug pa'i tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse rta zhal gyis mnan pa /
T02D3054:107b-35: mi'u thung gi rnam pa can /
T02D3054:107b-36: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D3054:107b-38: lha dang lha ma yin thams cad bsdigs pa dang dbyig pa 'chang ba'o //
T02D3054:108a-1: gyi kha dog spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bsam par bya'o //
T02D3054:108a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bsgoms pa las yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02D3054:108a-4: dpag bsam gyi shing dang bcud len la sogs pa'i
T02D3054:108a-5: dngos grub kyis grub pa mngon sum du 'gyur ro
T02D3054:108a-6: zhes gsungs so // rtog pa bdun brgya pa nas gsungs pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3054:108a-8: // / rgya gar b'a r'a na s'i'i pandi bu ru shotta ma'i zhal snga nas mnyan te /
T02D3054:108a-9: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan
